segments.advisor_message: So, let me summarize what you've told me about your income sources so far. You mentioned having a job and receiving a salary, correct?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that's right! I earn around, um, fifty thousand a year from my full-time job.

segments.advisor_message: And you said that's your main source of income, but you also have rental income. Can you remind me about that?
segments.client_message: Right! I have a rental property. I get about twelve hundred dollars a month from it, and that’s gross before taxes.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So that's a nice add-on to your salary. Do you have any specific timeframe or notes related to this rental income?
segments.client_message: Uh, not really. Just, um, it's ongoing for now, and I don't think there’s anything else to mention.
